author: cnbc.com
title: Boot Barn: Fiscal 4Q Earnings Snapshot
text:
IRVINE, Calif. (AP) _ Boot Barn Holdings Inc. (BOOT) on Tuesday reported fiscal fourth-quarter net income of $6.9 million.
The Irvine, California-based company said it had net income of 24 cents per share. Earnings, adjusted for pretax gains, came to 17 cents per share.
The results met Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of six analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was also for earnings of 17 cents per share.
The Western apparel and footwear retailer posted revenue of $170.8 million in the period, surpassing Street forecasts. Five analysts surveyed by Zacks expected $165 million.
For the year, the company reported profit of $28.9 million, or $1.05 per share. Revenue was reported as $677.9 million.
Boot Barn expects full-year earnings to be 92 cents to $1.02 per share.
Boot Barn shares have increased 32 percent since the beginning of the year. In the final minutes of trading on Tuesday, shares hit $21.96, more than doubling in the last 12 months.
This story was generated by Automated Insights ( http://automatedinsights.com/ap ) using data from Zacks Investment Research. Access a Zacks stock report on BOOT at https://www.zacks.com/ap/BOOT
